title: Cindy Ngamba
content:
Discipline: Boxing

Country of Origin: Cameroon

Born: 09/07/1998

"Boxing is my family, my best friend, my sibling, my partner. In the ring, you're alone, you can't hide. You have to be your own coach."

Doubt fuels Cindy's fire. She punches back at skeptics, turning doubt into her power in the ring.

IOC Refugee Olympic Team

We’re proud to be the official kit supplier to the IOC Refugee Olympic Team.

Terrains d’Avenir

The Olympic Refuge Foundation and Nike support the refugee and migrant community in Paris.

title: Marcus Rashford
content:
Nationality: English

Born: 31/10/1997

Born with desire. To score, to win, to sweat, to strive. To get better every single day and lead by example.

"When you believe in yourself, incredible things can happen."

The Marcus Rashford Collection is made for a new generation.

Play Forward By Marcus Rashford

Play Forward encourages the next generation to dream big on and off the pitch.

The Mission

Play Forward leverages the power of football to help young people find their superpowers.

"At first, I thought Play Forward was just another after-school club..."

Luca, 12

"Before Play Forward, my behavior wasn't very good..."

Adnaan, 12

title: Trained Podcast: Find Authenticity With Fabian Domenech
content:
Discipline: Coaching

Nike yoga teacher Fabian Domenech has taught all over the world.

Over the past decade, yoga participation in the United States has nearly tripled.

Thanks to yoga, meditation, and travel, Fabian learned self-love and detachment.

"I think we need yoga in our lives somehow, just to be centered, to improve as humans."

Fabian Domenech
